table-type.name: Catalog
table-type.description: This is a placeholder table type used to group all catalogs in a hierarchy

column.name: ins_plan_id
column.descr: The plan that this catalog contains a price map for

field.caption: Insurance Plan ID
field.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

table-type.name: Catalog_Item
table-type.description: This table type is used to instantiate a table that will hold catalog items. This is where you attach a cost to services or products.

column.name: catalog_id
column.descr: The ID for the catalog in the table corresponding to the above field

field.caption: Catalog ID
field.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: item_id
column.descr: The item that this record stores a price map for

field.caption: Item ID
field.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: item
column.descr: The name of the item that this record stores a price map for. To be used only if 'Other' is stored in the above field

column.name: cost
column.descr: The cost associated with this item. The actual cost will consist of multiple fields, such as dispensing amount, default dispensed amount

table-type.name: Product_Catalog
table-type.description: This is a placeholder table that will be used to define a product catalog (i.e. a catalog for products sold). This is different from a service catalog which details services rendered.

table-type.name: Service_Catalog
table-type.description: A bill for services rendered, usually associated with an action. The catalog record will only store information about a catalog.
